description: The headquarters of the Marines, located in Paradise. The site of the greatest war in One Piece history between the Marines and the Whitebeard Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Whitebeard Reveals His Powers at Marineford
keyEvents.description: Whitebeard demonstrates the full might of the Gura Gura no Mi at the Marine headquarters.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the greatest war begins, with Whitebeard's power threatening to destroy the entire island.

keyEvents.title: Twin Tsunamis Threaten Marineford
keyEvents.description: Whitebeard creates two massive tsunamis that threaten to destroy Marineford completely.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the scale of destruction possible in this war and the threat to Marine headquarters.

keyEvents.title: Aokiji Saves Marineford
keyEvents.description: Admiral Aokiji freezes the tsunamis, preventing the destruction of Marineford.
keyEvents.significance: Shows that the Marines have the power to protect their headquarters from even Whitebeard's attacks.

statusHistory.reason: Marine headquarters is operational and under siege

description: Whitebeard's flagship, a massive whale-shaped ship that serves as the main base for the Whitebeard Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Ace's Assassination Attempts on Moby Dick
keyEvents.description: After being defeated, Ace repeatedly attempts to assassinate Whitebeard on the Moby Dick.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the patient, fatherly nature of Whitebeard and establishes the foundation of their relationship.

keyEvents.title: Blackbeard Murders Thatch on Moby Dick
keyEvents.description: Marshall D. Teach murders Thatch on the Moby Dick to steal the Yami Yami no Mi.
keyEvents.significance: The greatest betrayal in the crew's history, taking place on their home ship.

statusHistory.reason: Ship is operational during this episode

description: The second half of the Grand Line, known as the most dangerous sea in the world where only the strongest pirates can survive.

keyEvents.title: Ace vs Jinbe in the New World
keyEvents.description: Ace and Jinbe fight for five days in the New World as Ace tries to reach Whitebeard.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the dangers and power levels in the New World where even reaching a Yonko requires fighting through Warlords.

statusHistory.reason: The New World exists as the dangerous second half of the Grand Line
